name: Beast Taming: Starting with the Classic of Mountains and Seas, Sweeping Across the Globe
author: Seven Rabbits Comics &#40七兔漫画&#41
content: Starting with the Classic of Mountains and Seas, Sweeping Across the Globe The era of Beast Masters has arrived globally, but the Great Xia is on the brink of collapse due to a break in ancient civilizations, with no one able to summon powerful beasts. The time-traveler Yang Yang starts by summoning the Classic of Mountains and Seas, using the legendary beasts from the mythic mountains and seas as his own!
